text: Florin Vașken Halagian (7 March 1939 – 12 August 2019) was a Romanian football player and manager. He was the manager who has the most matches in Liga I with 878 games. He played for Dinamo București. He managed Argeș Pitești and the Romanian national team. Halagian was born in Bucharest. Halagian died on 12 August 2019 in Bucharest at the age of 80.Doliu în fotbalul românesc! A murit Florin Halagian! ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest Category:Romanian footballers Category:Romanian football managers
title: Florin Halagian
